attributes.comment:
Dear Sir/Ma'am,

My husband and I are pursuing an adoption from China. As you probably know the
wait time until an adoption match is received has grown so much that he 18 month
time period for the 171-H is not sufficient. So we will have to pay the I-600
fee twice. I understand that you are responding to your budget problems with a
fee increase. But adoptive parents and advocacy groups appealed to the USCIS
last year in regards to the wait time issue with China. There were hearings and
some talk about an extension process but it seems that your only response was
just to raise the fees. So I appeal to you that if these fees are raised and I
assume they will be that you offer an opportunity for us to file an
extension(with no or a small fee) of our I-171H rather than taking advantage of
our unfortunate situation.

Sincerely,
Angela R Smith

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Angela R. Smith
